thread.title: Bell's 1-yard TD run at buzzer lifts Steelers over Chargers
thread.title_full: Bell's 1-yard TD run at buzzer lifts Steelers over Chargers

author: BERNIE WILSON
title: Bell's 1-yard TD run at buzzer lifts Steelers over Chargers
text:
Lenny Ignelzi Bell's 1-yard TD run at buzzer lifts Steelers over Chargers 
Pittsburgh Steelers cornerback Antwon Blake runs on his way to a touchdown off an interception while playing the San Diego Chargers during the second half of an NFL football game Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in San Diego. (AP Photo/Lenny Ignelzi) Lenny Ignelzi Bell's 1-yard TD run at buzzer lifts Steelers over Chargers 
San Diego Chargers quarterback Philip Rivers throws a pass against the Pittsburgh Steelers during the first half of an NFL football game Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in San Diego. (AP Photo/Lenny Ignelzi) Denis Poroy Bell's 1-yard TD run at buzzer lifts Steelers over Chargers 
Pittsburgh Steelers quarterback Mike Vick throws a pass during the first half of an NFL football game against the San Diego Chargers, Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in San Diego. (AP Photo/Denis Poroy) Posted: Monday, October 12, 2015 11:46 pm Bell's 1-yard TD run at buzzer lifts Steelers over Chargers   
SAN DIEGO (AP) â€” Le'Veon Bell scored on a 1-yard wildcat run as time expired to give Mike Vick and the Pittsburgh Steelers a stunning 24-20 victory over the San Diego Chargers on Monday night.
